issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Events "two finger tap" and "touch cancel" are not fired on "Window Events" page.

Steps:
1. Launch KitchenSink.
2. Go to Base UI> Window events.
3. Try to trigger each event.

Expected events:
All events are triggered.

Actual events:
Events "two finger tap" and "touch cancel" not triggered.

Note: It occurs on Kindle fire. it is not a regresion. It occurs on 2.1.2.GA.
fields.summary: Android: not all events are fired on "Window Events" page.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120920154617
2.1.2.GA
Devices:
Kindle fire.

comments.body:
Occurs on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120920154617
Devices: 
Kindle fire
Note:
Events "two finger tap" and "touch cancel" not triggered.
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
